latestUpdates.title: Dynamic Personalization & Complete UI Redesign
items: Personalized starting questions based on user intent (trial matching vs. learning)
Dynamic greetings adapted to user role (patient vs. caregiver)
4 distinct sets of starter prompts for different user profiles
Complete homepage visual redesign with cinematic glass morphism aesthetic
Enhanced glassmorphism effects with backdrop blur and gradient overlays
Redesigned feature cards with hover animations and improved iconography
Optimized responsive layout for all screen sizes (mobile, tablet, desktop)
Interactive mobile navigation with full-screen overlay menu
Improved typography hierarchy and brand consistency across all breakpoints
Better visual hierarchy with noise textures and decorative grid lines

latestUpdates.title: Voice Input Enhancements & User Feedback
items: Added dual voice input modes: Web Speech API and OpenAI Whisper
Voice input mode selector in header (switch between free real-time and accurate paid options)
OpenAI Whisper integration with auto language detection (Chinese/English)
Voice input comparison test page at /voice-test
Recording timer and processing indicators for Whisper mode
Enabled feedback buttons (thumbs up/down) for AI responses
Enabled retry button for regenerating AI responses
Fixed voice button container blocking input field interaction

latestUpdates.title: Voice Input for Enhanced Accessibility
items: Added voice input button with Web Speech API integration
Real-time speech-to-text with interim results display
Automatic medical terminology correction (Alzheimer's, dementia, MCI, etc.)
36x36px white circular button with blue/red color states
Responsive layout with fixed width breakpoints (575px, 768px)
Visual feedback with pulsing animation and success/error toasts
Positioned to overlay ChatKit's compose area seamlessly

latestUpdates.title: User Personalization & Profile Management
items: Added Personalization menu item in Clerk UserButton dropdown

Implemented API routes for viewing, updating, and deleting user profiles
Profile data stored in Supabase including health info, caregiver status, and location preferences
Full support for ADRD diagnosis tracking and mobility preferences
